00036 
00037 // TCLAP include
00038 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00039 
00040 // STL includes
00041 #include "iostream"
00042 #include "string"
00043 
00044 // ITK includes
00045 #include "itkImage.h"
00046 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00047 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00048 #include "itkExtractImageFilter.h"
00049 
00050 
00051 template<typename T>
00052 int ImageExtractor(std::string inputFileName, std::string outputFileName, unsigned int imageIndex)
00053 {
00054   //typedef short ScalarType;
00055   const unsigned int SequenceDimension = 4;
00056   typedef itk::Image<T,SequenceDimension> Sequence;
00057   typedef itk::ImageFileReader<Sequence> SequenceFileReader;
00058 
00059   const unsigned int ImageDimension = 3;
00060   typedef itk::Image<T,ImageDimension> Image;
00061   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter<Image> ImageFileWriter;
00062 
00063   typedef itk::ExtractImageFilter<Sequence,Image> ExtractImageFilter;
00064 
00065   // Read DWI sequence
00066   typename SequenceFileReader::Pointer reader = SequenceFileReader::New();
00067   reader->SetFileName(inputFileName);
00068   reader->Update();
00069 
00070   // Extract image filter
00071   typename ExtractImageFilter::Pointer filter = ExtractImageFilter::New();
00072 
00073   filter->SetInput(reader->GetOutput());
00074   typename Sequence::RegionType region = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00075   region.SetSize(3,0);
00076   region.SetIndex(3,imageIndex);
00077   filter->SetExtractionRegion(region);
00078   filter->SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00079   filter->Update();
00080 
00081   // Write image
00082 
00083   typename ImageFileWriter::Pointer writer = ImageFileWriter::New();
00084   writer->SetInput(filter->GetOutput());
00085   writer->SetFileName(outputFileName);
00086 
00087   try
00088   {
00089     writer->Update();
00090     std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00091   }
00092   catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00093   {
00094     std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00095     std::cout << err << std::endl;
00096   }
00097   return 0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 
00103 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00104 {
00105     // Command line variables
00106     std::string inputFileName;
00107     std::string outputFileName;
00108     unsigned int imageIndex;
00109 
00110     //
00111     // Parse program arguments
00112     //
00113 
00114     try
00115     {
00116         // Defines command line parser
00117         TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("BTK DWI baseline image extractor", ' ', "0.1");
00118 
00119         // Defines arguments
00120         TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i", "input", "Input DWI sequence", true, "", "string", cmd);
00121         TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o", "output", "Output image filename (default \"B0.nii.gz\")", false, "B0.nii.gz", "string", cmd);
00122         TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> imageIndexArg("", "image_index", "Index of the image to extract (default 0)", false, 0, "unsigned int", cmd);
00123 
00124         // Parsing arguments
00125         cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00126 
00127         // Get back argument's values
00128         inputFileName  = inputArg.getValue();
00129         outputFileName = outputArg.getValue();
00130         imageIndex     = imageIndexArg.getValue();
00131     }
00132     catch(TCLAP::ArgException &e)
00133     {
00134         std::cout << "TCLAP error: " << e.error() << " for argument " << e.argId() << std::endl;
00135         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00136     }
00137 
00138     //Guessing the component type
00139     typedef itk::ImageIOBase::IOComponentType ScalarPixelType;
00140     itk::ImageIOBase::Pointer imageIO = itk::ImageIOFactory::CreateImageIO(inputFileName.c_str(), itk::ImageIOFactory::ReadMode);
00141 
00142     imageIO->SetFileName(inputFileName);
00143     imageIO->ReadImageInformation();
00144     const ScalarPixelType pixelType = imageIO->GetComponentType();
00145     std::cout << "Pixel Type is " << imageIO->GetComponentTypeAsString(pixelType) // 'double'
00146               << std::endl;
00147 
00148     switch (pixelType){
00149       case itk::ImageIOBase::SHORT:  ImageExtractor<short>(inputFileName, outputFileName, imageIndex); break;
00150       case itk::ImageIOBase::USHORT: ImageExtractor<unsigned short>(inputFileName, outputFileName, imageIndex); break;
00151       case itk::ImageIOBase::FLOAT:  ImageExtractor<float>(inputFileName, outputFileName, imageIndex); break;
00152       case itk::ImageIOBase::DOUBLE: ImageExtractor<double>(inputFileName, outputFileName, imageIndex); break;
00153 
00154       default:
00155         std::cerr << "Pixel Type ("
00156                   << imageIO->GetComponentTypeAsString(pixelType)
00157                   << ") not supported. Exiting." << std::endl;
00158         return -1;
00159     }
00160 
00161     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00162 }
